Work
Résumé

The Kelly Apartments

Year — 2017

Scope — Identity, Web Design.

Location — Bala Cynwyd, PA

Website — The Kelly Apartments →

Logo lockup and visual System

The Kelly is inspired by the elegance of Grace Kelly and the golden age of Hollywood. The logo mark was developed directly from the interior patterns of the building, while using Kelly green and gold to emphasize the aspirational character of the first building in the newly minted NoBA District, PA.

Printed Matter

The grid created to develop the K logo mark was used as my system for creating the entire brand; from the printed material to the website design, this grid defines the entire brand.

Initial Sketches

My initial web sketches focused on creating a site that utilized this grid in an effective and intuitive way, avoiding any gimmick and non user-friendly design implementations.

Web Development

With the brand solidified and the idea for the website sketched out, I applied the content to a full design mockup. In this stage, I focused on getting all the content to work within the grid system while developing effective UI/UX experiences. I also incorporated some interesting design elements while avoiding unnecessary additions.
